qas.question: Along with Saint Paul, what city constitutes the Twin Cities?
About how many Somalis moved to Minnesota ten years ago?
What area of Minneapolis contains a notable number of Somalis?
What sort of meat is sold in Somali businesses in Minneapolis?

context: An estimated <a1_0>20,000<a1_0/> Somalis emigrated to the U.S. state of Minnesota some ten years ago and the Twin Cities (<a0_0>Minneapolis<a0_0/> and Saint Paul) now have the highest population of Somalis in North America. The city of Minneapolis hosts hundreds of Somali-owned and operated businesses offering a variety of products, including leather shoes, jewelry and other fashion items, <a4_0>halal<a4_0/> meat, and hawala or <a3_0>money transfer services<a3_0/>. Community-based video rental stores likewise carry the latest Somali films and music. The number of Somalis has especially surged in the <a2_0>Cedar-Riverside<a2_0/> area of Minneapolis.
